thread.title: Dell and Microsoft team up for Azure-based hybrid cloud service
thread.title_full: Dell and Microsoft team up for Azure-based hybrid cloud service

title: Dell and Microsoft team up for Azure-based hybrid cloud service
text:
Dell and Microsoft team up for Azure-based hybrid cloud service 
The Inquirer Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
with Microsoft to expand its cloud service with a new hybrid cloud offering based on Azure. 
Featuring technology jointly developed by the two companies, Dell Hybrid Cloud System for Microsoft was announced by the two firms' CEOs, Michael Dell and Satya Nadella, on stage at...
